lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've returned from our Gen Con live show last week, which went amazingly and since we are back in our home front here at the table, let's go ahead and jump into some announcements before the show, beginning with our fantastic sponsor, our friends in Campaign 2 since the beginning, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now, you guys might've caught the end of the D&D Beyond presidential campaign last week, where Liam and myself were elected co-presidents of D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something happened and maybe we should tell you guys what happened or maybe it's just better to just show them what happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is done. It is done, but we have to show the people how it really ended.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: The winner, everyone in the world, is Mr. Liam O'Brien! [cheering]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will you make me the happiest president of D&D Beyond on Earth? [cheering] [cheering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Woo, we did it! Wow! Wow! What a great show! What a great ending to the show!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Out of the way, wiener dog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for bringing me along for the ride, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: D&D Beyond isn't going to know what them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we do first? What do we do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did not think you could fit that your nose, but you did! Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, I mean, that's a tough--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are the presidents of D&D Beyond.

lines.name: ADAM
lines.text: But you're not anymore because you're both fired.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have so much work to do!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He seemed really sad or mad or I can't tell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got more votes, so you should pay for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we still be the presidents of I don't know, each other?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'll always be my number one, Mr. President.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that's the end of our presidential reign, unfortunately. We were presidents for about 90 minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We flew too close to the sun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like leaving on Sunday early or Saturday was a mistake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you made the right call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you again to D&D Beyond for allowing us to go on this journey and we learned a lot and we'll never make those mistakes again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. That is absolutely true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That party was off the hook! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Erika Ishii and the one-arm pushups.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We did announce that we're headed to Austin--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And she just had a music video drop today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not knowing where one might be found, you stepped out into the alley on the side of the smithy to where a hooded, cloaked figure approached you from the shadows, and that's where we're going to go ahead and pick up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mica Burton is joining us as our guest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was not going to have another Noelle Stevenson happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need me to recap you on the D&D Beyond campaign?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or should we just get into it?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I saw your codpiece and that's all I needed, so I'm all caught up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to describe what they see as you approach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Laura Bailey has a run for her money!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How will you roll any of them?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: This one says fuck on the one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to touch them. Can I touch them?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: She has a scimitar and a wand stuck in her brown belt and she has long long long white blonde hair down to her waist up in a super-high ponytail on her head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A faint glowing halo just above the head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any physical resemblance to Yasha, not like facial resemblance, but is it the same body type?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a cloak with a hood?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: A white cloak with a hood and a gold trim and it matches the gold trim on her dress.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is your hood up or down right now?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: My hood is down right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brown-skinned, gold, golden eyes, and freckles?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Golden freckles all over her body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Golden freckles, that is so cool.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I'm just here to make sure that everything's fine, but I see that you've met Umi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes? Is that the guy in there that we talked to?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Yeah, and I couldn't help but overhearing something about a dragon.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I couldn't help but overhearing something about going to find this dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm glad I wasn't the only one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were listening to our entire--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'm not sorry. I'm...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You heard the whole conversation, then, or just the end?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: And you guys don't seem bad, you just seem...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, are friends or family or?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have you known him?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: But I like to bake him things--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: He's my friend and we like to, sometimes we tell each other secrets and sometimes we like to plant flowers together and sometimes, even though he grumbles about it, he lets me leave him little presents in his forge, I don't know if you saw them, if you saw the flowers on the wall, that was me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't listen to a single word she's saying!"

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Umi, be quiet, you know you love me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see his arms splayed out on both sides of the doorframe, his face wet with sweat and bright red and he's just like, "Would you please be so kind as to maybe, you know, "not just go rambling about things to strangers?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right? There's nothing to be ashamed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like we finish each other's sentences.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go for it, but just, you know, "friends keep certain things between friends."

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: So you don't want me to bring you back a souvenir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, yes, a souvenir'd be great, I'd love that."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, good luck, stay alive, I'll be here."

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Umi likes my cakes, right, Umi?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and you can choose your flavor, though!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got to see how many I have left, hold on, let me look at my thingie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You actually wrote that down, how many cupcakes you have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Other possessions. I have four cupcakes left!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They are fresh, I just got them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, I think they were blueberry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you had a black moss cupcake?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like the opposite of vanilla, but it's so good! It kind of tastes like matcha.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I just shove it in my face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, I hate to interrupt the cupcake bonanza, but we are supposed to be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't get a little frosting on your cloak, because it's so pristine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it good, do you like it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She seems to be enjoying the cupcake, but who knows?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we going to stand in the street or what are we doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to go with a bunch of strangers back to a hotel room?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I don't see what could be wrong with that.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I'll make sure they don't die!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got to stop back by this bakery, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to walk and talk?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look around, make sure no one's listening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you do? How do you know, are you a blacksmith like Umi? Uni?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: No, I'm not a blacksmith, I kind of keep this place safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From invaders, are you in the military?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: No, well, there's a lot of bad people here and--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I like to wander and help people, you know? I found Umagorn and he was, he took me in when I accidentally-- it's a long story.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: How about you guys come over to my house and I'll make you guys tea and then we can talk.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I have tea! Do you like tea?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like you're our dream come true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She likes tea, she likes baked goods, do you also like whiskey?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I have wine if that's more your style.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who do you work for? Who sent you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said you know about secret underground organizations?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you... are you playing both parties right now? Are you a spy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you been in this city longer than that?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I've been here for about five years.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: About five years. What were you doing before that?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Well, before that I was wandering around saving other people, and before that, I was dropped off by my mom in Nicodranas, and before that, I don't know, I was born, I guess.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I'm sorry, were you asking about...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was a little bit curious, I've never seen a-- what is that?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Well, Landon told me that it means that I'm part angel or celestial or something, but I don't know, some really nice angel talks to me from time to time in my dreams and tells me what to do, so I'm just going to trust it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Landon is the name of your angel?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: He's kind of my dad, I don't know my dad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know my dad either!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you like fire? Do you shove balls into your stomach?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I don't shove anything into anywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that your actual accent? Do you have another accent that you're hiding?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like we are losing focus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't understand why you want to accompany us on that.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Well, it's funny you mention that, because remember the whole angel thing that I was telling you about?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Then I heard you guys talking about a white dragon, so I feel like I have to go with you, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your angel's been talking about a white dragon?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I get dreams sometimes that tells me what to do so I follow it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look, it's five out of six! (shouting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever been in jail? Have you ever pretended to be someone else?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you like to burn things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who doesn't like to burn things from time to time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There, you've got six out of six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he dressed in a green cloak?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: My angel's name is Samliel, and he likes to talk to me and he came to me when I was really little and he tells me to go help people and he told me to come here and so I've been here for five years and he hasn't really talked to me since, for a few years now, but then he started telling me about this dragon and then you guys said dragon, and so I feel like I should be here, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we all need to sit down with a cup of tea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're part angel or celestial but you have an angel that speaks to you, I'm sorry, I'm just trying to play catch-up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, your house, how far is that from here and who is, who lives at your house?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have your own house after five years?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't know what the real estate market is here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, we have our own house after like two days in Xhorhas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, but we came by it under very questionable circumstances.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, she made the-- have you ever carried a dodecahedron across enemy lines?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, maybe not with all of our stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we close to your home?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: We are, it's on the Liber Disk so we're just going to walk a little bit further and we're going to get to my house and if you want tea, I have tea, if you have wine, I have wine, I can also bake cookies,

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's going to kill us all.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: All right, well then follow me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still not redacting my theory that we might be dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm following behind her very enthusiastically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is precisely what we've needed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few eyes turn curiously as you walk by, some seem just confounded, some seem untrusting, some seem dubious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody seems to cause any sort of stir for a being that walks around with a faint halo visible half the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably as if they have seen it a number of times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we're walking, can we just keep an eye out for anyone else that has glowing circles above their heads?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you move along for a few minutes, gauging this unexpected conversation and companion, you turn to see the domicile of Reani, if would you like to describe the home that they encounter?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: It's a small home, mostly elven details, only one story, but once you enter, it goes far back so it's like a studio apartment, so it's kitchen, then living room, and then two small doors, so bedroom and bathroom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like the shotgun houses of New Orleans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's unusual, there's no sunlight, yes?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Well, I can keep them looking nice and I love plants.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Well, once when I was a kid, and Landon told me to go get herbs, because he likes herbs, he's like an alchemist, and I was his apprentice and that's where my mom dropped me off, still haven't met her though, that sucks, but I ran into these fey and they gave me powers and now I can do cool druid stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See, Fjord, you just meet someone and they give you powers.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Do you need a fairy or something, is that what's happening?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need a fairy, Fjord?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you like rent them or something?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: If we go to a forest, I'm sure I could find one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dragon, bringing it back to the dragon.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Oh right, the dragon, yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As this conversation is going on, I'm going to wander around and look at all your knickknacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like someone dropped an ADD bomb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm very interested in hearing what Samliel--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has been telling you about a dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give you any can he or they give you any details about where or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So he just came to you in a dream and said, "There is a white dragon?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How often do you communicate with your angel?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Well, he's been telling me about a white dragon every night for the past two weeks, and last night I didn't get anything, and today I met you! So I'm guessing that's going to be it for a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he just pops in and goes, "White dragon," and then goes away.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Mm-hmm, or "Bad guys," or sometimes, "Big quest," or sometimes, "There's a war you have to stop!" Or, you know, stuff like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a war that you have to stop?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long has it been since we messed up underneath the ground with the King Who Crawls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's probably been a few days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have taken a few evenings to recover or for transitions to Nicodranas, so about a week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is good, this is good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to leave a little figurine of the Traveler that I have made amongst the rest of her knickknacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cleverly, expertly placed as you just wander past one of the shelves and without even a moving or twitch of the arm, suddenly, something is there that previously wasn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bringing the conversation back to our dragon, which could possibly be her dragon, is this, are we doing this now, we are set out in the morning to find this thing or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then figure out where we're going and head out in the morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, don't we need materials first? We need the sword, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb does, but Liam doesn't remember, did they give us directions to where this thing is or it's just out in the wild?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were told of the Plexus Post, which is an odd trading post run by an individual named Ava, and those are the only real clues you have at the moment, the rest is up to you guys to try and figure out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The items that we needed, we needed the sword--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You need some mithral to take with you to be enchanted and whatever else you guys are looking for as far as like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Refined residuum, if that's something you're looking for as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, the breath on the mithral.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I imagine we could go try and talk to Ava, see if she has any?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that, you have a stomachache?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mean like she would hit us, or--

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: No, mean like she doesn't like my flower crowns when I give them to her.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Before he even answers I immediately start Druidcrafting little flowers and start weaving them together super fast and I just place the flower crown on his head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we're quite likable, so maybe we can turn the tide and go speak with her and get her--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know where she, she has this Plexus Post?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know where that is?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I do, but can we go there after wine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wine and tea for the moment, sure.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Yeah! I immediately start bustling around the kitchen and making tea and pouring glasses of wine for everyone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe she just doesn't want party favors placed on top of her head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe you should talk to her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to the archive, so...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would like to join you at the archives but you could also, we could go and we could talk to Ava first, or Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want to go to the archives, I'd be happy to talk to her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can hold entire worms with a whip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold worms, yep. Hold the worms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we need to find some mithral.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, do we have a lead on mithral?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, maybe the trading post, that's a good place to start for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't Umi tell us that she would have some?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- everybody who's looking for everything everywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After tea and wine, I assume.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go with you, we can do some research, figure out the white dragon, maybe some mithral, maybe some other things, we'll hit the books.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you actually hit the book? I can imagine you hitting the the books, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then let's have that tea and wine and be on our way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's delicious. Do you have any milk?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay, that's okay, tea is really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe didn't have it to begin with.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only soy milk or almond milk, there's no actual milk in this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's goats. They have goat milk here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goat milk, is that beast milk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goat milk is actually pretty popular in dwarven societies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't mean to pry, but that scimitar you have is quite impressive.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Thanks, I kill a lot of things with it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a wand in your belt?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you prefer, the wand or the sword?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I want to Wild Shape into a wolf.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I don't think a dire wolf would fit in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Reani takes a moment and then shifts the entire body magically into a wolfen form.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I'll spin around in a circle and I'll sit in the dog bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the dog bed for you? How long can you stay a dog?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I just, I don't know, sometimes it's comfy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really like, sometimes I'm an animal, too

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Right? Sometimes I like to sleep as a dog because I dunno, it's comfy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never thought to do that.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: You'll get a great night's sleep, I promise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This one time I was a moth and I ate curtains.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Well, now I got to try it!

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I'll take your word for it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far is the archive from where we are now, do you know, Reani?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's maybe about an hour's walk.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I can pack snacks. Does anybody want snacks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we're going to two different places, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some of us are going to the Plexus Post with you to meet Ava.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then our learned gentleman here wants to go to the archive.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I know guys at the archives, I can go with you after if you want!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you-- is the archive on the way to the Plexus Post? Further down into the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's right on the cusp of the bottom disc.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Listen to the angel, it's better to stick together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At the first sign of hesitation, you can leave.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: If I give you one of my books to hold, would you feel better?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any good books?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I have a lot of books about plants.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Do you want a book about plants?

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: It's about plants you can make poisons out of, I hope you like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I might want to take a look at that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you know, actually we had a, we have-- we

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I was trying to be positive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She is no longer a good person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's stuck being a bad person right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She might not have ever been a good person.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: I'm getting a lot of different stories here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've lost a friend for the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just didn't know if, this is going to sound like a dumb question, but if there wasn't some sort of communication system--

lines.name: MICA

lines.text: We'll talk more when we get back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How old is that, what's that mean, you have any information?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If it's 250 years old, it could be an adult."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I say this "as an individual who has survived this long "because I knew when to run."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed, and you have made it this far, "that means you are listening."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooshing) I need someone to go ahead and roll--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A percentage dice for me, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doing it on the map cam? Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's good, that's good. I think? Or is that bad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on, I'm pulling up, I'm pulling it up right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not an exact science.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could be bamfed into a rock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me pull it out of the book here, it's a little convoluted in that, so, keep the number in mind, thank you for your patience here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moonweaver ain't going to help you there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what'd you roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't do that! That's so mean!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you'll be joining us again for next week.

lines.name: MICA
lines.text: Yay! (clapping) Or you're like, "And this is where you die, "goodbye, get out."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You skipped a shit ton of possible encounters there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Earned some more in Essek's debt by doing so, but you managed to avoid a lot of possible dangers so well done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he say more Essek debt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll show you some of the maps afterwards, because I was damn proud of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, don't apologize, this is my game, guys, that's what I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget, we love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night! [epic music]
